mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, batch_id, brand_id, amount, arrival_time, order_time, spend, postage, trace_code, other_cost, remark, status, create_time, last_modified_time from crm_purches_record where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into crm_purches_record(tenant_id, batch_id, brand_id, amount, arrival_time, order_time, spend, postage, trace_code, other_cost, remark, status, create_time, last_modified_time) values (#{tenantId}, #{batchId}, #{brandId}, #{amount}, #{arrivalTime}, #{orderTime}, #{spend}, #{postage}, #{traceCode}, #{otherCost}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime})

insert into crm_purches_record(tenant_id, batch_id, brand_id, amount, arrival_time, order_time, spend, postage, trace_code, other_cost, remark, status, create_time, last_modified_time) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.batchId}, #{entity.brandId}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.arrivalTime}, #{entity.orderTime}, #{entity.spend}, #{entity.postage}, #{entity.traceCode}, #{entity.otherCost}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime})

insert into crm_purches_record(tenant_id, batch_id, brand_id, amount, arrival_time, order_time, spend, postage, trace_code, other_cost, remark, status, create_time, last_modified_time) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.batchId}, #{entity.brandId}, #{entity.amount}, #{entity.arrivalTime}, #{entity.orderTime}, #{entity.spend}, #{entity.postage}, #{entity.traceCode}, #{entity.otherCost}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime})
on duplicate key update tenant_id = values(tenant_id), batch_id = values(batch_id), brand_id = values(brand_id), amount = values(amount), arrival_time = values(arrival_time), order_time = values(order_time), spend = values(spend), postage = values(postage), trace_code = values(trace_code), other_cost = values(other_cost), remark = values(remark), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), last_modified_time = values(last_modified_time)
mapper.update:
update crm_purches_record
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
batch_id = #{batchId},
brand_id = #{brandId},
amount = #{amount},
arrival_time = #{arrivalTime},
order_time = #{orderTime},
spend = #{spend},
postage = #{postage},
trace_code = #{traceCode},
other_cost = #{otherCost},
remark = #{remark},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_modified_time = #{lastModifiedTime},
where id = #{id}
